title: Creating a Common Denominator
text: We must find the LCD in order to be able to add the fractions. The LCM of $$2ab+b^2$$ and (4a**2-b* *2) is (2ab+b**2)(4a**2-b* *2)

title: Rewriting Each Fraction
text: We can rewrite each fraction with a common scaler to get $$\frac{2a\left(4a^2-b^2\right)}{\left(2ab+b^2\right) \left(4a^2-b^2\right)}+\frac{3a\left(2ab+b^2\right)}{\left(2ab+b^2\right) \left(4a^2-b^2\right)}$$
